Title: NIA sets off to track flow of ‘terror funds’ in the Valley
Content: The National Investigation Agency (NIA) has registered a preliminary enquiry to track the flow of funds in several bank accounts in the valley, which are suspected to have been used for financing terr
Author: Special Correspondent
